amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish an Office of Energy Employment and Training, as well as an Office of Minority and Women Inclusion that would be responsible for all matters relating to diversity in management, employment, and business activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 112-540 to establish an Office of Energy Employment and Training, as well as, an Office of Minority and Women Inclusion that would be responsible for all matters relating to diversity in management, employment, and business activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass (CA) amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Bass (CA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bass (CA) amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.
